quote.issuer_name: Harbin Bank Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Harbin Bank Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Harbin Bank Co Ltd is a China-based company engaged in deposit services, loan services, payment, settlement services, financial leasing services, as well as other financial services. The Company operates four segments. Corporate Financial Business segment provides financial products and services to corporate customers, including deposits, loans, settlement and clearing and other products and services relating to the trading business. Retail Financial Business segment provides financial products and services to retail customers, including deposits, bank cards and credit cards, personal loans and collateral loans and personal wealth management services. Interbank Financial Business segment covers money market placements, investments and repurchasing, foreign exchange transactions for the Group's own accounts or on behalf of customers. Other Business segment represents businesses other than the corporate financial business, retail financial business and interbank financial business.
